gameCommand1.commandDescription1: To MOVE from one place to another, type go plus the direction you want to go.

gameCommand2.commandDescription2: to examine in a specific room, type examine plus the name of the room location.

gameCommand3.commandDescription3: to use a specific item, type use plus the item you want to use.

gameCommand4.commandDescription4: to exit a room, type exit plus the name of the room location.
